entry.title: Linux PAM Tutorial
entry.summary: Linux Hint published a Linux PAM tutorial.Linux PAM Tutorial A guide on using the high-level API known as PAM in Linux for dynamic authentication support using many secure systems that are user-friendly and dependable. Linux PAM Tutorial

entry.title: GIT Compare Two Branches
entry.summary: Linux Hint published a tutorial showing you how to compare two GIT branches.GIT Compare Two Branches This covered ways of comparing branches on Git to see their difference in commits, HEAD, and files.
